name: Item Batch Expiry Within 15 days DFM
query:
select
 b.batch_id as "Batch No:Data:100",
 b.item as "Item Code:Data:100",
 i.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
 b.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
 b.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",
 DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now()) as "Item Expiry(In Days):150"

From 
  `tabBatch` b , `tabItem` i
where  
 b.item = i.item_code and
  DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())<16 and DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())>-1
report_name: Item Batch Expiry Within 15 days DFM
